snippet.title: Redfall – “Welcome to Redfall” Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Slay alone or squad up for up to 4 player co-op in Redfall, an open-world story-driven FPS from the creators of Dishonored and Prey. 

The town of Redfall is under siege by a legion of vampires who have cut the island off from the outside world. Trapped with a handful of survivors, choose from a roster of heroes to create the perfect team of vampire slayers and take back Redfall. 

Bite Back when Redfall launches in 2023!

Learn more about Redfall and gameplay details here: https://bethesda.net/en/article/4vdPhp1CR9bKQfLiBf1ZGY/top-things-you-need-to-know-about-redfall
Watch the full gameplay trailer: https://youtu.be/IpY_IMjT9Ik

Official Site: Redfall.com
Twitter: twitter.com/playRedfall
Facebook: facebook.com/playRedfall
Instagram: instagram.com/playRedfall

ESRB RATING PENDING: May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit www.esrb.org for rating information.
